verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump ’s nominee] to [V: lead] [ARG1: the Department of Veteran ’s Affairs] is under fire for a series of alleged incidents in his role as physician to the president .

[ARG1: President Donald Trump ’s nominee to lead the Department of Veteran ’s Affairs] [V: is] [ARG2: under fire] [ARGM-CAU: for a series of alleged incidents in his role as physician to the president] .
President Donald Trump ’s nominee to lead the Department of Veteran ’s Affairs is under fire for a series of [V: alleged] [ARG1: incidents] in his role as physician to the president .
